headline: Evercore ISI Initiates Coverage on AppLovin (APP) With Outperform Amid Mobile Gaming and E-Commerce Ad Expansion
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) ranks among the most promising QQQ stocks according to hedge funds. Evercore ISI began coverage of AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) on January 14 with an Outperform rating and a price target of $835, citing the platform’s widening growth runway as it establishes an effective advertising unit for e-commerce.
